mapper.select: select return_apply_info.*, order_detail_info.product_id, order_detail_info.product_name, order_detail_info.display_image, order_detail_info.full_category_name, order_detail_info.cost, order_detail_info.actual_cost, order_detail_info.number from return_apply_info join order_detail_info on return_apply_info.order_detail_id = order_detail_info.order_detail_id where return_apply_info.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
